Our Hip and Knee surgery team is in the top 1% nationwide, while Orthopaedic surgery ranks in the top 3%, and Gastrointestinal & General surgery make it to the top 5%! Kudos to our dedicated doctors, including C. Lowry Barnes, M.D., for their relentless pursuit of knowledge and commitment to improving patient care through research.
